feed.title: Geoposler Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Geoposler: v0.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update SMTP configuration to include useSSL option explicitly and modify related settings by @garanda21 in https://github.com/garanda21/geoposler/pull/2
  • Fix SMTP authentication and improve template preview functionality by @garanda21 in https://github.com/garanda21/geoposler/pull/5

New Contributors

  • @garanda21 made their first contribution in https://github.com/garanda21/geoposler/pull/2

Full Changelog: https://github.com/garanda21/geoposler/commits/v0.1.0
